data_maturity_score.evidence: Heavy reliance on Oracle tools (ADW, ER/Studio) with no mention of modern data stack (dbt, Airflow, Snowflake), CI/CD, or data quality testing tools. Focus on dimensional modeling and ETL suggests developing practices.

data_maturity_level.evidence: Matches score of 2 - basic pipelines with Oracle tools, no modern governance or quality monitoring mentioned.

maturity_signals.evidence: Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) in OCI environment indicates cloud-native architecture, but no other modern maturity signals present.

scope_creep_score.evidence: Focused on data modeling, ETL, and data warehouse implementation with clear responsibilities. No conflation with ML, DevOps, or frontend roles.

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Contract role with 10+ years experience requirement suggests high expectations; no PTO or work-life balance signals mentioned. Hybrid work (2 days in office) may indicate some flexibility.

role_clarity.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities centered on data modeling, dimensional modeling, ETL, and mentoring. No vague or multi-role descriptions.

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Moderate risk due to contract nature, high experience requirement, and lack of benefits/work-life balance signals. Role itself is well-defined with no scope creep.

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: No information about reporting manager or team structure in job posting.

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No managerial titles or reporting structure mentioned in job description.

team_growth_velocity.evidence: No information about team size, growth trajectory, or hiring velocity in job posting.

team_composition.evidence: No details about team size or composition provided in job description.

reporting_structure.evidence: No information about reporting lines or organizational structure in job posting.

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: No mention of embedded work with product teams or cross-functional collaboration beyond standard stakeholder interaction.

work_life_balance_score.evidence: No PTO, unlimited time off, or work-life balance signals mentioned. Contract role with hybrid work (2 days in office) suggests some flexibility but no protective factors.

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: No mention of learning budget, conferences, mentorship programs, or career paths. Mentoring team members is mentioned but not as a formal growth opportunity.

tech_culture_score.evidence: Oracle-centric stack with no mention of modern engineering practices (CI/CD, code review, testing). Focus on traditional data warehousing rather than innovation.

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No mention of open source, tech blogs, conference speaking, hackathons, or innovation time.

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of code review, CI/CD, monitoring, incident response, or other development practices.

innovation_signals.evidence: Focus on traditional data warehousing and dimensional modeling with no mention of experimentation, R&D, or new technology exploration.

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: No mention of tech debt management, refactoring, or code quality improvement initiatives.

ai_integration_level.evidence: No mention of ML, AI, or GenAI in job description. Focus is entirely on data modeling and warehousing.

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML tools mentioned in requirements or nice-to-haves.

hiring_urgency.evidence: No mention of immediate start, ASAP, or urgent hiring needs.

competition_level.evidence: Contract role with 10+ years experience requirement may limit applicant pool, but location (Sacramento, CA) and hybrid work may attract candidates. No application count available.

company_stage_inferred.evidence: Contract role with state/government experience requirement suggests established organization rather than startup. Oracle-centric stack also indicates established enterprise environment.

hiring_velocity.evidence: Contract role with specific experience requirements suggests backfill or replacement rather than aggressive expansion.

team_size_signals.evidence: No information about team size or composition provided in job description.

funding_stage_signals.evidence: No information about funding stage or financial status in job posting.

role_creation_type.evidence: Contract role with specific experience requirements and state/government focus suggests replacement rather than new headcount or team expansion.

strength_details: Clear, focused data modeling role with specific responsibilities
Oracle Cloud (OCI/ADW) experience required - cloud-native environment
Established organization with state/government experience requirement
concern_details: Salary not disclosed - contract role with hourly pay may be below market
No visa sponsorship mentioned - US work authorization required
Limited growth opportunities - no career path or learning budget mentioned
Contract role with 10+ years experience may indicate high expectations and potential overtime
best_fit_details: Senior data modelers with 10+ years experience in Oracle environments
Candidates with state/government data warehousing experience
Contract workers seeking Oracle ADW/OCI projects
probe_details: Ask about expected hourly rate or daily rate for contract position
Clarify if any visa sponsorship is available for non-US citizens
Inquire about team size and reporting structure
Understand expected work hours and any overtime requirements
leverage_details: 10+ years experience with ER/Studio and Oracle ADW is a rare combination
State/government data warehousing experience is a valuable differentiator
Kimball Dimensional Modeling expertise is highly specialized
summary.overall_assessment: Suitable for senior data modelers with Oracle ADW/OCI experience seeking contract work in government/state sector. Well-defined role with clear responsibilities but limited growth opportunities and no salary transparency. Contract nature and high experience requirement suggest potential for demanding work expectations.
